channel.title: Sled and add in new npc for server (HELP?)
channel.description:
1.So I spawn sled and try to ride it instead of riding on it or standing on the sled nothing happen i can't even put it in my equipment list how can i fix this?
2. I know how to add in weapon but don't know how to add in New npcs how do i do that help?

item.title: Sled and add in new npc for server (HELP?)
item.dc:creator: @Rat_racer550 Rat racer550
item.description:
@Rat_racer550 wrote:

I don’t know about the sled, but to add an NPC go into your client files, search for class5.java, and add your NPC ints in there. It should work then. You might have to go in game and load your NPC models.

Read full topic
item.source: Sled and add in new npc for server (HELP?)
